scenes.background: Bob looks thoughtful and then speaks up.
scenes.description: 'What about a mix of activities? A bar and then some outdoor adventure?'

options.text: That could work. Mixing activities might keep everyone happy.
options.analysis: You acknowledged Bob's suggestion and showed empathy and perception by considering everyone's preferences. Your self-regulation and social skills were moderate.

options.text: I'm not sure if combining both will be practical.
options.analysis: You showed self-regulation and practicality by questioning the feasibility but were less empathetic and socially skilled.

options.text: Why complicate it? Let's just stick to one plan.
options.analysis: You showed social skills by trying to simplify the plan but lacked self-regulation and empathy.
